lines.text: let n , k , i , h be integers with h = 0
let l , r , p , s be strings with l = LEFT , r = RIGHT , p = PRINT
lines.code: string l = " LEFT " , r = " RIGHT " , p = " PRINT " , s ;

lines.text: while h is not equal to k - 1
print p and s [ i ] and newline
if i is not equal to n - 1 , print r and newline
lines.code: if ( i != n - 1 ) cout << r << endl ;

lines.text: while h is not equal to n - k
for i is equal to n - 1 , i > = 0 , decrement i by 1
print p and s [ i ] and newline
if i is not equal to 0 , print l and newline
